name: Zudomon
description: Zudomon's body resembles a humanoid walrus with a single horn on its head similar to a unicorn , albeit barbed at the tip. Its body is light blue and has orange fur on its face, left arm, and feet, and a mass of furry, red-tipped tails. It wears an Archelomon shell bolted to its back and wields a hammer called Thor's Hammer.
